112.content: Potty training it is. Now, since Tommy is one year old, how does this happen?
112.title: Potty training

1121.content: What story shall we go with?
1121.title: Stu and Didi try to Potty-train Him Early

11211.content:
One day, Tommy and Chuckie were in Tommy's house, playing with Chuckie's Bogo Block village in the playpen. They were having a good time, when suddenly, Tommy stopped to ask Chuckie a question.

"Chuckie, what's it like to be potty trained?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Tommy.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you go potty?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"They do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone. Why do you ask?" Chuckie asked Tommy. Before Tommy could answer, he heard Didi.

"There you are, Tommy." She said. Didi was carrying a potty seat. It wasn't Chuckie's, but it looked a little like it, except it was blue and white. She set the potty down in the playpen.

"Time for your potty check." Didi told Tommy, then she untaped his diaper, which was dry.

"Good boy. You must be excited to learn to use the potty just like Chuckie." Didi told Tommy. She picked him up and sat him down on the potty.

"Now, you be a good boy and stay on your potty. Mommy will be right back to check on you. Maybe Chuckie can help." Didi told Tommy, then she went into the kitchen to throw the diaper away.

"That's why." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Oh. Do you need to go potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Hmmm, not right now." Tommy told Chuckie. He climbed off his potty, then walked over to the Bogo Block village, not caring that he wasn't wearing his diaper.

"Come on, Chuckie! Let's go back to playing!" Tommy told Chuckie. Chuckie was reluctant upon seeing Tommy diaperless, but decided to go back to playing with him anyway.

What happens next?
11211.title: Story 1

choices: Didi takes Tommy and Chuckie outside
112111.content:
Chuckie reached for the townsperson closest to Tommy, when all of a sudden, he felt a wet spot on the floor. It didn't take long for him to figure out where it came from.

"Uh, Tommy?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Yes, Chuckie?" Tommy replied.

"I think you forgetted to go potty in the potty." Chuckie told Tommy, who looked down at the wet spot in front of him.

"Oops. Sorry, Chuckie." Tommy said, feeling a little embarrassed.

Didi walked back into the living room, and was shocked when she saw that Tommy accidentally peed on the floor.

"Oh, dear!" She said, feeling worried.

What happens next?
112111.title: Tommy has to pee

choices: Chuckie Teaches Tommy How to Use the Potty
1121111.content:
Didi was determined not to give up on potty-training Tommy, so she decided to try a different strategy. She took Tommy, still diaperless, outside along with his potty, as well as Chuckie. This way, if Tommy had another accident, it wouldn't stain the carpet.

"Now, you boys play nicely outside while Mommy cleans the oopsie out of the carpet." Didi told Tommy and Chuckie.

What happens next?
1121111.title: Didi takes Tommy and Chuckie outside

11211111.content:
When Chuckie saw that Didi had also brought his potty outside, he decided to teach Tommy how to use the potty.

"Tommy, do you have to go potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"I don't know." Tommy told Chuckie, feeling unsure. The last time he thought he didn't have to go, he accidentally peed on the floor, so he didn't know if he had to go this time or not.

"You should probably use your potty now before you have another accident." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Good idea, Chuckie." replied Tommy.

"Here, I'll help you." Chuckie said as he brought his potty to Tommy.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to go potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Tommy, then he pulled down his pants and underwear. Since Tommy's diaper was already off, he imagined he was wearing it and taking it off.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do is sit on my potty." Chuckie told Tommy, then he sat down on his potty. Tommy then sat down on his potty.

"Then... I... go." Chuckie said nervously as he felt a sudden urge to pee.

"Are you okay, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Yes, I'm fine!" Chuckie said nervously. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he did want a set a good example for his best friend, especially because he wanted Stu and Didi to be proud of Tommy for using his potty. Chuckie closed his eyes and imagined that Tommy wasn't there. Then, he peed into his potty, sighing with relief afterwards. Tommy watched Chuckie and tried to do as he did.

Did Tommy use his potty?
11211111.title: Chuckie Teaches Tommy How to Use the Potty

"There. It's okay if you're not ready to use the potty right now. Just tell Mommy when you are, okay?" She asked him. She then decided to take him and Chuckie somewhere else to play while she cleaned up the stain.

11221.content:
Tommy Pickles had just turned two years old. He still wore his usual light blue t-shirt and white diaper with yellow tapes, but he had grown a small patch of purple hair on his head. His younger brother, Dil, was now one year old and could walk all by himself. Chuckie was now three, Kimi was now two and a half, and Phil and Lil were now two. Kimi, Phil, and Lil were now all potty-trained and no longer wearing diapers. Tommy and his friends were in the living room, talking about Tommy's second birthday party.

"That was the bestest birthday party I ever had, especially the cake." Tommy said to Phil and Lil.

"Yeah, it was the greatest. I wonder if your mommy and daddy are going to potty-train you since you're two years old now." Lil said.

"Yeah, I hearded that when you're potty-trained, that means no more wearing diapers." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Oh, yeah, I hearded about that, toos." Tommy said.

How did Tommy feel about being potty-trained?

122121.content:
The babies were curious when they saw Chuckie's potty.

"What is it?" asked Phil.

"I don't know." replied Lil.

"Maybe it's a hat." Tommy said as he put the lid of the potty on his head.

"Nah, then what's the rest for?" asked Phil.

"Maybe it's a big mush bowl." Tommy said as he climbed into the potty and ducked.

"It's a potty! You guys won't believe what they're trying to make me do!" Chuckie told Tommy, Phil, and Lil.

"What, Chuckie?" asked Tommy.

"Yeah, what?" asked Phil and Lil.

"They're trying to make me... they're trying to make me... oh, I can't say it!" said Chuckie.

"Tell us, Chuckie." said Tommy.

"They're trying to make me... use that instead of my diaper!" Chuckie said as he pointed at his potty.

"Nah, that can't happen." Phil told Chuckie.

"Yeah, how's it gonna fit in your pants?" Lil asked Chuckie, who sighed unhappily.

"But Chuckie, they can't do that to you!" protested Tommy.

"Well, they're doin' it, they call it gettin' potty-trained! It's the worstest thing that's happened to me since my mom put me on the bottle!" Chuckie told his friends.

"What are you gonna do?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"I don't know, I've tried everything!" Chuckie told Lil.

"Maybe you could put a lot of napkins in your pants and use them like a diaper!" Lil suggested as she pulled up her dress, exposing her diaper.

"I tried it!" said Chuckie.

Does Chuckie re-attempt Lil's suggestion?
122121.title: Writer's Choice 1

1221211.content:
"Maybe it didn't work the first time because you didn't use enough." Lil told Chuckie. She, Tommy, and Phil went into the kitchen and got every napkin they could find. They soon came back with their hands filled with napkins.

"Okay, Chuckie. Let's try it again!" Lil told Chuckie. Chuckie held out his pants and Tommy, Phil, and Lil stuffed their napkins in it. Soon, Chuckie's pants were full.

"There. That should be enough to hold it." said Lil.

"Come on, Chuckie! Give it a try!" Phil told Chuckie.

Did Chuckie test the napkins out by peeing in them?
1221211.title: Yes

12213.content: This scene is altered in what way?
12213.title: When Chuckie First Has To Pee

choices: Didi Takes Chuckie to the Bathroom
122131.content:
Angelica was in the kitchen. She overheard Chuckie talking to the babies.

"Ha! You little babies really make me laugh! First, you cry for your mommies every time you get a little wet." She said as she walked up to the playpen.

"And now, finally, you get to go without em' forever, and what do you do? Chicken out! What's the matter? Little baby scared to be without his diapers?" She asked Chuckie.

"No, that's not it. I'm not scared. I... I just don't want to be potty-trained, that's all. It's just not right!" insisted Chuckie.

"Not right? Ha! That's a good one! Don't you dummies know anything? Everybody who's anybody is potty-trained!" Angelica told the babies.

"Well, not me, I'm never gonna do it! They can't make me! I'm gonna wear my diapers forever, and nobody is gonna stop me! Not my mom, not my dad, not the Present of the Beknighted Stakes!" Chuckie said proudly as he stood up. However, his speech soon came to a close when he felt an uncomfortable feeling.

"Because I..." he stammered.

"Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I..." Chuckie said as he put his hands over the front of his pants.

"What's the matter, Chuckie?" asked Phil.

"What's wrong?" asked Lil.

"I... I... I gotta go!" Chuckie exclaimed, and he began to cry.

What happens next?
122131.title: RC 1

1221311.content:
Didi heard Chuckie crying and saw his hands pressed against the front of his pants. She knew right away that he needed to pee.

"Oh, dear! This is it! Stu, hurry!" Didi said as she picked Chuckie up. Stu ran to her.

"What, Deed?" asked Stu.

"Get the potty, get the potty!" Didi told Stu.

"Where?" asked Stu.

"There!" said Didi as she pointed at Chuckie's potty. Didi rushed Chuckie to the bathroom, and once she set him down, she pulled down his pants and underwear. Stu arrived just outside the bathroom door with Chuckie's potty.

"Now what?" Asked Stu.

"Put it down." said Didi. Stu did so, outside the bathroom door.

"Not there, over here!" said Didi.

"Put it in the bathroom! Get me a washcloth! Help me with his shoes! His diaper bag!" Didi said to Stu. As she was barking orders, Tommy, Phil, and Lil rushed to the bathroom.

"Help me pull off his pants! Not his shirt, his pants! Oh, where's his No More Diapers book? Hurry! Hurry!" exclaimed Didi. Stu handed Didi the book as she sat Chuckie down on his potty. Tommy, Phil, and Lil watched from outside.

"Now what, Deed?" asked Stu.

"Well, according to Lipschitz, we're supposed to wait right here until he does his business, then give him plenty of praise so that he gets the right idea." Didi told Stu.

"We just... wait?" asked Stu.

"Well, that's what the book says, we just... wait." replied Didi. Chuckie sighed unhappily. He sat on his potty for a very long time.

Did Chuckie pee in his potty?
1221311.title: Didi Takes Chuckie to the Bathroom

12213112.content:
Chuckie sat on his potty for a very long time, but he didn't pee in it. At last, Stu and Didi fell asleep. As this happened, Tommy, Phil, and Lil walked into the bathroom and up to Chuckie.

"Hey, Chuckie, are you okay?" asked Tommy.

"Is it so much to ask, Tommy? Is it so much to ask? I just want things to stay the way they've always been!" complained Chuckie.

"Aw, come on, Chuckie! Why are you acting like such a baby?" asked Phil.

"Yeah, they're gonna make you do it anyway, why don't you just go along with it?" asked Lil. Chuckie sighed unhappily.

"Yeah, when it happens to you guys, maybe that's what you should do." Chuckie told the twins.

"Happens to us?!" Phil and Lil asked in horror.

"Nah." they said in denial.

"Well, I guess I don't have to go after all." Chuckie said as he climbed off his potty.

What happens next?
12213112.title: No

Tommy could see that Chuckie was feeling upset, so he tried to make him feel better. He put his hand on Chuckie's shoulder.

"Aw, don't feel bad, Chuckie. Accidents happen." Tommy assured Chuckie.

1511321111111.content: What was their first rule?
1511321111111.title: Yeah.

15113211111111.content: She agreed. Other rules were...
15113211111111.title: No potty

151132111111112.content: Does she have to drink from a bottle?
151132111111112.title: SE

1511321111111121.content: Other rules were she'd have to go down for naps?
1511321111111121.title: Yes

15113211111111212.content: Will Angelica have to talk only in baby talk when in public?
15113211111111212.title: Any more.

15113211111121.content: What did Angelica's parents buy first?
15113211111121.title: Buy baby supplies

15113212.content: Upon seeing her friends hit the pinata, Angelica decided she didn't want to be a baby anymore. Did she also decide to take off her baby clothes to prove it?
15113212.title: No

151132121.content:
As Angelica watched her friends hit the pinata from inside the playpen, she began to regret wanting to act like a baby.

"I'm gonna miss all the chocolates!" She complained.

"By the way, Angelica, you can't have any of those little candies, neither. They're too dangerous for babies." Chuckie told Angelica.

"What? Why?" asked Angelica.

"Well, we might put em' in our nose or something!" Tommy told Angelica.

"Sounds like a few dumb babies have gone and ruined things for everyone! You can't do anything fun! I mean, look at me! I'm sitting here in a diaper, drinking from a bottle!" Angelica complained.

"It may not look like much to you, Angelica, but it's our world, and it's all we know!" Chuckie told Angelica.

"Yeah? Well, I'm not gonna play by your little baby rules anymore! In fact, I'm not even gonna wear these stupid baby clothes anymore!" Angelica told the babies.

Does Angelica take off her bonnet first?
151132121.title: Yes

1511321211.content: Next to go was the shirt?
1511321211.title: Yes

15113212112.content: Did she decide to take off her diaper?
15113212112.title: Something else.

151132121122.content: What made her want to keep it on?
151132121122.title: No

1511321212.content: What does she take off first?
1511321212.title: No, something else.

15113212122.content: Does she do so on her own?
15113212122.title: Her Diaper

151132121221.content:
Angelica untaped her diaper and let it fall to the floor of the playpen.

What does Angelica take off next?
151132121221.title: Yeah.

1511321212211.content:
Angelica untied her bonnet and angrily tossed it out of the playpen. Then she pulled her shirt up over her head and tossed it aside. She was now naked.

"Look out, Pinata! Here I come!" shouted Angelica. She jumped out of the playpen and raced towards the pinata. She pushed her friends out of the way, snatched the stick, and with one hit, she knocked all the candy out of the pinata. Everyone stared in shock when they saw Angelica naked.

What happens next?
1511321212211.title: Her Bonnet

15113212122111.content: Does Susie tease Angelica for being naked?
15113212122111.title: Reader's Choice 1

151132121221111.content:
When Susie saw Angelica naked, she laughed at her.

"What's so funny? Angelica asked Susie.

"It's a good thing today's your birthday, Angelica, because you're wearing your birthday suit!" Susie shouted. Everyone laughed at Angelica, who covered her naked body with her arms and blushed in embarrassment.

What happens next?
151132121221111.title: Yes

1511321212211111.content: He cancels the rest of her party?
1511321212211111.title: Drew Punishes Angelica

1511321212211112.content: Did Drew forgive Angelica seeing that it's her birthday?
1511321212211112.title: Something Else

15113212122112.content: Does Drew punish Angelica for taking off her clothes?
15113212122112.title: Reader's Choice 2

151132121221122.content: Did Drew let this slide seeing as it's Angelica's birthday?
151132121221122.title: No, something else.

1511321212212.content: Her shirt was next, then the bonnet. She changed back into her normal clothes?
1511321212212.title: Her Shirt

151132121222.content: Does one of the babies help Angelica take off her diaper?
151132121222.title: Nah.

1511321212221.content: Is it Lil that does?
1511321212221.title: Yes

15113212122213.content: Who helped Angelica take off her diaper?
15113212122213.title: Phil or Tommy.

151132121222132.content: Did she let him, though?
151132121222132.title: Tommy

1511321212221321.content:
"Tommy, I need help taking off my diaper." Angelica told Tommy.

"No problem, Angelica." Tommy told Angelica. He untaped her diaper and it fell to the floor of the playpen.

"There, it's off." Tommy told Angelica.

"Thanks." replied Angelica.

What did Angelica take off next?
1511321212221321.title: Yeah.

153.content: For Angelica's rival, do we focus on diapers?
153.title: Susie Carmichael

154.content: Which of these will we focus on?
154.title: Kimi Finster

1541.content: Do Chaz or Kira try out a new brand of diapers?
1541.title: Diapers

15412.content: Does Kimi go on some sort of diaper-related adventure?
15412.title: Hmm, anything else.

1542.content: Potty training it is. Now, what story will it be?
1542.title: Potty training

15421.content:
As a toddler, Kimi wondered what what it was like to use the potty, like her older brother, Chuckie. Whenever Chuckie needed to pee or poop, he would go into the bathroom and use the toilet. Kimi, however, wore diapers and needed to be changed.

One day, Kira had just changed Kimi's diaper. As she set Kimi down, Kimi saw Chuckie running to the bathroom. Kimi followed him inside, much to his ire. Chuckie liked having Kimi as a little sister, but he didn't always like the things she did. One of those things was follow him into the bathroom whenever he needed to use the toilet.

"You gotta stop following me in here, Kimi! Sometimes a kid needs his piracy!" Chuckie told Kimi.

"I'm sorry, Chuckie. It's just... I..." Kimi stammered.

"What, Kimi? What's so important that you gotta follow me into the bathroom?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"I just want to know what it's like to use the potty is all." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh." Chuckie said meekly. He now felt bad about snapping at Kimi, and was actually glad she showed interest in being potty-trained.

"Well, Kimi. I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Kimi.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Well, they do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone." Chuckie assured Kimi.

Does Chuckie try to teach Kimi how to use the potty?
15421.title: Story 1

154211.content:
"Would you like to learn how to use the potty today?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh!" Kimi said excitedly.

"Okay." Chuckie said, and he got out his old clown potty for Kimi to use.

"Here, Kimi. You can use my old potty. Since I started going potty on the toilet, I hardly ever use it anymore." Chuckie told Kimi, then he began to teach her how to use the potty.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to use the potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Kimi, and he pulled down his pants and underwear. Kimi then untaped her diaper.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do sit it on the potty." Chuckie told Kimi, and he sat on the toilet. Kimi then sat on Chuckie's potty.

"Then... I... go... potty." Chuckie said nervously. Kimi was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Nothing, Kimi. I'm fine!" Chuckie told Kimi. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he wanted to set a good example for his little sister. He closed his eyes and imagined Kimi wasn't in the bathroom with him. Then he sighed with relief as he peed into the toilet. Kimi watched Chuckie and tried to use his potty.

Does Kimi use Chuckie's potty?
154211.title: Yes

1542112.content:
Kimi sat on Chuckie's potty, but nothing came out. She stood up, looked into Chuckie's empty potty, and began to feel discouraged. Chuckie flushed the toilet, then climbed off it and pulled his pants and underwear back up.

"Chuckie, I don't think it's working. Nothing's coming out." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh. Sorry, Kimi." Chuckie said to Kimi as he washed his hands. Suddenly, he thought of something.

"Wait a minute, Kimi. Didn't your mommy just change your diaper?" He asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Then you probably don't need to go potty right now." Chuckie told Kimi, who still felt discouraged.

"Don't feel bad, Kimi. You can try again whenever you want." Chuckie assured Kimi.

"Thanks, Chuckie." Kimi said, feeling a little better.

"Now let's put your diaper back on." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi pulled up her dress and held still as Chuckie taped her diaper back onto her bottom.

"Good. Now let's wash your hands and then we can play whatever you want." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi washed her hands, and then she and Chuckie went into their bedroom to play together.

What happens next?
1542112.title: No

15421121.content: Someone came over to the Finsters' house to play with Chuckie and Kimi. Who was it?
15421121.title: Reader's Choice 1

1542112121.content:
The doorbell rang and Kira answered the door. Charlotte arrived with Angelica.

"Hi, Kira. Thanks for volunteering to watch Angelica while I work today." Charlotte told Kira.

"No problem, Charlotte. You know Angelica is always welcome in our house." replied Kira.

"Bye-bye, Angelica. Mommy will be back soon. Be good for Mr. and Mrs. Finster, okay?" Charlotte asked Angelica.

"Okay, Mommy. I will." Angelica said to Charlotte, then Charlotte left. Kira took Angelica to Chuckie and Kimi's bedroom to play.

"Now, you play nicely with Chuckie and Kimi." Kira told Angelica.

"I will, Mrs. Finster." Angelica said to Kira as Kira left for the kitchen. As soon as Kira was out of earshot, Angelica groaned. She hated babies and dreaded having to spend the day with Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hello, Finster, hello, Shorty." Angelica said unenthusiastically to Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hi, Angelica." Kimi said to Angelica. Suddenly, Angelica sniffed. Usually around this time, Kimi had used her diaper and needed to be changed, but today, she smelled clean.

"Hey, Shorty, why haven't you used your diaper?" Angelica asked Kimi.

"My mommy just changed me before you came here. Asides, Chuckie's teaching me how to use the potty today." Kimi told Angelica. Angelica was shocked when she heard this. She knew that once Kimi was potty-trained, she would stop wearing diapers, and she couldn't call her a dumb baby anymore. She also knew the same thing would eventually happen to Phil, Lil, and Tommy. As much as she hated babies, Angelica took delight in tormenting them, so she decided to keep Kimi in diapers for as long as she could.

How does she do this?
1542112121.title: Yes

15421121211.content:
Angelica looked around. When she saw one of Kimi's clean diapers on Kimi's changing table, she got an idea. She picked it up and taped it on over her tights.

"So, Kimi, I heard you're going to use the potty today." Angelica told Kimi as she walked up to her. Kimi was surprised when she saw Angelica wearing one of her diapers.

"Angelica, why are you wearing one of my diapies?" Kimi asked Angelica.

"Kimi, why waste all your time learning how to use the potty? When you wear a diaper, you can go potty wherever and whenever you want." Angelica told Kimi, and she sighed with relief as she pretended to use the diaper she was wearing.

Did seeing Angelica pretend to use her diaper make Kimi have to use the potty?
15421121211.title: Reader's Choice 1

15421122.content: Was it time for Chuckie and Kimi to take a nap?
15421122.title: Reader's Choice 2

choices: Kimi Wakes Up Dry But Desperate
154211221.content:
Just then, Kira came in, carrying a tray with two sippy cups filled with warm milk.

"Chuckie, Kimi, it's time for your nap. I brought you some warm milk to help you fall asleep." Kira told Chuckie and Kimi. The two toddlers drank their milk down to the last drop. As soon as they were finished, Kira tucked Kimi into her crib and Chuckie into his bed. She kissed them both on their foreheads.

"Sweet dreams." Kira said to Chuckie and Kimi, and the two toddlers fell asleep. About an hour later, Kimi woke up.

Did she wake up wet, or was she dry but needed to use the potty?
154211221.title: Yes

1542112211.content: Kimi woke up wet. Did she call for someone to change her diaper?
1542112211.title: Kimi Wakes Up Wet

choices: No, She Had to Poop as Well
1542112212.content:
To her relief, Kimi's diaper was still dry, but now she really had to pee. Chuckie was still asleep, and she didn't want to wake him up, so she decided to go to the bathroom by herself. She climbed out of her crib and ran to the bathroom, relieved to find that the door was open and there was no one inside. Kimi closed the door, then she untaped her diaper and sat down on Chuckie's potty. As soon as her cheeks touched the seat, she started peeing and sighed with relief. She peed until her bladder was empty and Chuckie's potty was full.

After she stopped peeing, was Kimi finished using Chuckie's potty?
1542112212.title: Kimi Wakes Up Dry But Desperate

15421122121.content:
At that moment, Chuckie woke up. He needed to use the toilet. He got out of his bed and ran to the bathroom. When he opened the door, he was surprised to see that Kimi had just gotten off his potty. He looked inside and saw that she peed in it. He was very proud of her.

"Good girl, Kimi, you went potty all by yourself!" Chuckie told Kimi, and he gave her a hug. He then picked up her untaped diaper.

"All right, now let's put your diaper back on." said Chuckie. Kimi pulled up her dress and held still as Chuckie taped her diaper back onto her bottom. After that, Kimi went to the sink to wash her hands.

"Excuse me, Kimi, I need to go potty now." said Chuckie.

"Okay, Chuckie." said Kimi, and she left to give him some privacy while he used the toilet.

What happens next?
15421122121.title: Yes

154211221211.content: Somebody came over to the Finster house to play with Chuckie and Kimi. Who was it?
154211221211.title: Somebody Comes Over

choices: "I liked it. It felt nice not to need my diapie changed."
"It was okay. I still prefer to use my diapies."
1542112212111.content:
Just then, the doorbell rang.

"I'll get it!" said Kira, and she answered the door. Didi had arrived with Tommy.

"Hi, Didi. Come on in." said Kira. Didi came in and set Tommy down in the playpen, where Chuckie and Kimi now were. She then went into the kitchen to talk to Kira.

"Hi, Tommy. How are you feeling today?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Oh, I feel great, Chuckie. My Mommy changed my diapie afore we came here, so I feel all nice and clean." Tommy told Chuckie.

"That's great, Tommy. You know, just afore you came here, Kimi used the potty all by herself!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Really?" Tommy asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh." said Kimi.

"Wow, Kimi! That's great! Now you're just like your big brother! How did it feel to use the potty?" Tommy asked Kimi.

What did Kimi tell Tommy?
1542112212111.title: Tommy

15422.content: Did Kimi want to be potty-trained?
15422.title: Story 2
